data.subTitle: Array.from达到.map 的效果
data.content:
咱们都知道.map()方法，.from()方法也可以用来获得类似的效果且代码也很简洁。

var arr = [
    { name: 'a', age:22 },
    { name: 'b', age:2 },
    { name: 'c', age:25 },
    { name: 'd', age:32 },
    { name: 'e', age:52 }
]

var newarr = Array.from(arr,({name}) => name)

console.log(newarr)
// ["a", "b", "c", "d", "e"]
